body_html: it is almost as easy as in chainer, here's im2col with pycuda on pytorch tensors https://gist.github.com/szagoruyko/89f83b6f5f4833d3c8adf81ee49f22a8. It uses NVRTC python bindings to compile PTX and pycuda to execute. This doesn't work with multigpu because pycuda is very conservative about stream sharing, so we will add a similar API to execute PTX in pytorch in non-default stream
